name: Worm Attack
description:
The human have disturbed your desert. Cause destruction to increase your score but be careful and look out for missiles. Defeat enemies without getting hit to heal

|Controls|

A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys - Rotate Clockwise/Counter Clockwise

Space - Boost Forward

Esc - End Game

Made for a prototyping class.

Feedback appreciated.

GLHF
